last_episode_to_air.name: I Own You Cube
last_episode_to_air.overview: Texas Cowboy's Ben Senior and Ben Junior are out to tame The Cube and bag themselves a quarter of a million dollars. Can the father/son duo use their family bond and Cowboy tactics to beat The Cube or will it be pistols at dawn?

name: The Cube
overview: The Cube is a 15 square feet of steel-edged plexiglass where simple tasks become challenges. Teams have nine lives to win seven games in order to beat The Cube for a chance to walk away with $250,000.

seasons.name: Season 2
seasons.overview: Season two will feature more games, celebrities, and winners. Actress Gabrielle Union-Wade and TV personality La La Anthony partner to kick off the first episode to beat "The Cube" and win money for charity. Other celebrity guests, competing for charities, will be woven throughout episodes and will include NBA legend Shaquille O'Neal, Grammy Award nominated, CMA & ACM Award winning country music star Jimmie Allen, and NBA Champion Iman Shumpert.

tagline: 7 simple games. 9 lives. Can you beat The Cube?

episodes.name: The World's Toughest Gameshow
episodes.overview: Dwyane Wade introduces The Cube. It's 15 square feet of steel-edged plexiglass where simple tasks become epic challenges! The teams have 9 lives to win 7 games in order to beat The Cube for a chance to walk away with $250,000.

episodes.name: Talk to Me Nice
episodes.overview: Host Dwyane Wade steps back into the arena to help husband-and-wife team Kal and Whitney beat The Cube for a chance to win $250,000.

episodes.name: This Game's Got Me
episodes.overview: The games get harder as the prize money increases for married couple Daisy and Taylor and host Dwyane Wade uses an assist to give friends Stephen and Chris a One-Shot as they set out to beat The Cube.

episodes.name: 50-Thousand-Dollar Finger
episodes.overview: Dwyane Wade welcomes siblings Kelsey & Jared into The Cube. Do they have what it takes to defeat the Cube for a chance to win $250,000, or will they crash out once they learn that these simple tasks are epic challenges?

episodes.name: Point and Pump
episodes.overview: The pressure is mounting as two new teams enter the Cube for another chance at winning $250,000. With 9 lives and 7 games, who has what it takes? Hosted by 3-time NBA champion Dwyane Wade, it's The Cube.

episodes.name: Can I Get out of Here?
episodes.overview: The world's toughest game show continues, as Dwyane Wade welcomes Paralympic Gold medalists Oksana Masters and Aaron Pike as they take a break from training for Tokyo 2021. Will they see that gold floor in the Cube or meet their match?

episodes.name: Will They or Won't They?
episodes.overview: Lovebirds Elie and Keyana are fierce competitors and are on the verge of making Cube history but will they go all the way? Then we meet engineers Jenni and Marie as they use science in their attempts to beat the Cube. Will it be a big bang or will they bottom out? Hosted by 3-time NBA champion Dwyane Wade, it's The Cube.

episodes.name: Go Hard or Go Home
episodes.overview: Engineers Jenni and Marie hope to use their scientific superpowers to beat The Cube. Next up, best friends Audrey and Kavi are determined that The Cube is no match for their positive energy and unbreakable bond.

episodes.name: Lean on Me
episodes.overview: The Cube piles on the pressure, pushing more teams to their breaking point, proving that this really is the world's toughest game show. Will Audrey and Kavi hold onto their money with a Dwyane Wade assist?

episodes.name: Dwyane Wade, Show Me the Ladder!
episodes.overview: Two more teams take on the undefeated Cube in the penultimate episode of the season. Will mother and daughter duo Shanden and Mae be the first to take $250,000 or will best friend teachers, Sammy and Lucson, finally teach the Cube a long overdue a lesson?

episodes.name: You. Got. This!
episodes.overview: How far will dynamic duo Sammy and Lucson go? Will champion axe-throwing sisters Ellie and Anna have the strength to take the Cube's money? And what will happen when Dwyane Wade is called off the bench for one final time to take the One-Shot?

episodes.name: America, Do You Have What It Takes?
episodes.overview: The Cube is back! Dwyane Wade returns with the world's toughest game show. We are launching the second season with some VERY special guests as Gabrielle Union-Wade and La La Anthony take on brand new games in The Cube for charity.

episodes.name: The G-Boys Are Coming
episodes.overview: Are Gabrielle Union-Wade and Lala Anthony about to make Cube history? Next in The Cube are Kweku & Kofi - fired up having seen the Cube destroy so many teams last season, the self-titled G-Boys are here to avenge Little Cubie.

episodes.name: Use Those Surgical Hands!
episodes.overview: As Kweku & Kofi give the Cube the best they've got, we welcome nurses Natasha & Kiana, who are confident they will conquer the Cube with their sporting background and surgical hands.

episodes.name: The Thanksgiving Grandma
episodes.overview: Wanda Dench shot to viral fame when she accidentally texted stranger Jamal Hinton when she intended to invite her grandson over for Thanksgiving. Six years on, these unlikely BFFs take on The Cube, hoping to be thankful for a 250k windfall.

episodes.name: Holy Shaq!
episodes.overview: The Cube is faced with a competitor like no other as NBA legend Shaquille O'Neal takes on the Cube in a solo attempt to win money for charity. It's man vs. Cube as the champion pushes the Cube to its limits!

episodes.name: Don't Make Me Unplug You!
episodes.overview: The Cube might have met his match when Baltimore BFFs Brianna and Niyah show the Cube a thing or two about attitude. Will their partnership and determination be enough to walk away with the bag?

episodes.name: Everyday's a School Day
episodes.overview: Best friends and fellow teachers John and Dave set out to teach the Cube a lesson, but learn that it's their relationship that's put to the test as they fight it out to try and win $250,000.

episodes.name: All or Nothing!
episodes.overview: Can Dr. Libby and daughter Kelsey use their family bond to outwit The Cube as they continue on their quest to win big? Their 'all or none' approach has left Dwyane Wade with his jaw dropped! Will they be the first to beat the Cube?

episodes.name: A Little Hater Up In Here I See
episodes.overview: Cheer coaches Tommy & Jermaine tumble into The Cube. But can they turn their positivity into cold hard cash? We then meet brothers Brian and Branden from San Francisco, California. Could they be the first to crack the Cube?

episodes.name: Get Out of the Jam, Cuz You're Toast
episodes.overview: Two brothers from San Francisco continue their game in The Cube with their eyes on the 250k prize. With their complementary skills, puzzle solving approach and unique team dynamic, will our 25th team be the first to beat the Cube?

episodes.name: I Love You Butâ€¦
episodes.overview: The Cube welcomes youth ministers and married couple Larissa and Luis as they take on the Cube backed by a higher power. On a mission to raise funds for their work, will the Cube give them its blessing?

episodes.name: I Own You Cube
episodes.overview: Texas Cowboy's Ben Senior and Ben Junior are out to tame The Cube and bag themselves a quarter of a million dollars. Can the father/son duo use their family bond and Cowboy tactics to beat The Cube or will it be pistols at dawn?

2.name: Season 2
2.overview: Season two will feature more games, celebrities, and winners. Actress Gabrielle Union-Wade and TV personality La La Anthony partner to kick off the first episode to beat "The Cube" and win money for charity. Other celebrity guests, competing for charities, will be woven throughout episodes and will include NBA legend Shaquille O'Neal, Grammy Award nominated, CMA & ACM Award winning country music star Jimmie Allen, and NBA Champion Iman Shumpert.
